results.title: Efficacy and safety of atenolol versus propranolol for treatment of infantile haemangioma: A narrative review.
results.text_hl: A total of seven studies comparing the two beta-blockers were identified in our search. @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ appeared to be as efficacious as @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@ and was associated with fewer @<m>DISEASE_Central_Nervous_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002493 @@@central nervous system and bronchial@@@-related @DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@adverse@@@ events.

citations.NLM: Shi M, Wargon O, Tatian A. Efficacy and safety of atenolol versus propranolol for treatment of infantile haemangioma: A narrative review. Clin Exp Dermatol. 2024 Oct 4;():. PMID: 39365598
citations.BibTeX: @article{39365598, title={Efficacy and safety of atenolol versus propranolol for treatment of infantile haemangioma: A narrative review.}, author={Shi M and Wargon O and Tatian A}, journal={Clin Exp Dermatol}}

results.title: Effects of 100 mg of controlled-release metoprolol and 100 mg of atenolol on blood pressure, central nervous system-related symptoms, and general well being.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>DISEASE_Central_Nervous_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002493 @@@Central nervous system (CNS)-related symptoms@@@ and quality of life during treatment with controlled-release (CR) @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@ and a standard formulation of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ were compared in a double-blind crossover study in 60 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with mild to moderate @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@.

citations.NLM: Walle PO, Westergren G, Dimenäs E, Olofsson B, Albrektsen T. Effects of 100 mg of controlled-release metoprolol and 100 mg of atenolol on blood pressure, central nervous system-related symptoms, and general well being. J Clin Pharmacol. 1994 Jul;34(7):742-7. PMID: 7929868
